Senior Researchers
Position: Head of Department
Title: Professor
Phone: +4538635055
Email: Michaelkjaer@sund.ku.dk Michaelkjaer@regionh.ku.dk
Research Focus: Investigation of tendon and intramuscular connective tissue adaptation to mechanical loading, and the pathogenesis behind overuse tendon injury. Further, the aging-related adaptation of skeletal muscle and connective tissue to exercise and disuse.

Position: Professor
Title: PT, DSc
Phone: +4538635055
Email: p.magnusson@sund.ku.dk
Publications: pubmed
Research Focus: The overall focus of our research is gain insight into the structure and function of human tendons as it relates to A) force transmission on a macroscopic and nanoscale level B) adaptation to physical activity and inactivity, and C) responses to various forms of treatment of tendon injury.

About ISMC

The ISMC is located in Copenhagen city, Denmark, and was established at the Department of Rheumatology at Bispebjerg Hospital in conjunction with the establishment of a professorship in Sports Medicine at the University of Copenhagen in 1997.

Visit us at
